Guideline 11.3

The Board should comment on the adequacy and effectiveness of the internal controls, including Page 40 financial, operational, compliance and information technology controls and risk management systems.

The commentary should include information needed by the stakeholders to make an informed assessment of the company’s internal control and risk management systems.

The Board should also comment on whether it has received assurance from the CEO and the CFO: (a) that the financial statements give true and fair view ofthe company's operations and finances; and (b) regarding the effectiveness of the companys risk management and internal control systems
